name: precious-metals-scraper
title: Precious Metals Price Aggregator
description: Scrapes product data from 11 major precious metals dealers simultaneously: JM Bullion, SD Bullion, APMEX, Hero Bullion, Silver.com, Provident Metals, Monument Metals, BGASC, ModernCoinMart, Kitco, and GoldSilver.com. Returns a unified dataset with dealer name, product name, price, image, SKU, availability, and description.
